document.topic_text: Kumar-a'n last 16 a lut Indian boxer Manoj Kumar chuan Riocentrio Pavilion-a inhnekah Lituiania tlangval Evaldas Petrauskas chu 29-28, 29-28, 28-29 a hnehin Rio Olympic mipa boxing Light Welterweight (64kg) category-ah last 16 a lut. Kumar hian Pathianni zan dar 9:00-ah Uzbekistan boxer Fazluddin Gaiznazarov achu last 16-ah a hmachhawn leh nghal ang. Kumar-a hmachhawn tur Gaiznazarov hi Rio Olympic medal dawng thei tura beiseiawm pawl niin 2015 World Championship silver medalist niin nikum vek khan Asian Championship-ah silver medal a lo dawng tawh bawk. Kumar hma hian Indian boxer tho Vikas Krishan chuan Charles Conwell hnehin middle weight category-ah last 16 a lo lut tawh bawk. Ani hian nizan khan Turkey boxer Onder Sipal a hmachhawn leh a, result kan hre hman lo thung. Share this Post
